Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels
MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Gentamicin
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with gentamicin for automated and visual antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Determines quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci using colonies grown on solid media, including gentamicin testing for staphylococci.
